GOD.content: the speculative requires a heterotautological position (Hegel, revealed religion that is precisely Christian) [G], always risks meaning nothing, speculates on every secret [re: tout autre est tout autre]
GOD.linkedContent: the speculative requires a heterotautological position (Hegel, revealed religion that is precisely Christian) [G], always risks meaning nothing, speculates on every secret [re: tout autre est tout autre]

GT.content: [re: “Counterfeit Money”] only a liar could know whether friend gave real money, that is, a connoisseur of counterfeit money; so narrator believes, credits his friend
GT.linkedContent: [re: “Counterfeit Money”] only a liar could know whether friend gave real money, that is, a connoisseur of counterfeit money; so narrator believes, credits his friend

GT.content: literature as place of non-place of frame, triptych w/ dislocated frame, 3 + or – excluded 4th, all positions exchangeable to infinity, an ex-propriation that forbids a return to self, most powerful or interesting speculation
GT.linkedContent: literature as place of non-place of frame, triptych w/ dislocated frame, 3 + or – excluded 4th, all positions exchangeable to infinity, an ex-propriation that forbids a return to self, most powerful or interesting speculation

GT.content: readers are at once debtors & creditors, like the narrator, we are the beggar, the 3rd party excluded from the secret of the dual scene
GT.linkedContent: readers are at once debtors & creditors, like the narrator, we are the beggar, the 3rd party excluded from the secret of the dual scene

GT.content: as long as money counts, produces effects, as long as it assures finite possibilities of decision & judgment, it is simply not different from money it counterfeits > a more powerful but not infinitely powerful [?] inscription of effects of reference on truth, convention, dispositifs
GT.linkedContent: as long as money counts, produces effects, as long as it assures finite possibilities of decision & judgment, it is simply not different from money it counterfeits > a more powerful but not infinitely powerful [?] inscription of effects of reference on truth, convention, dispositifs

GT.content: opposition of conventional to natural is discredited, or, more rigorously, it is limited in its indispensable credit, in the speculation it will always have to authorize
GT.linkedContent: opposition of conventional to natural is discredited, or, more rigorously, it is limited in its indispensable credit, in the speculation it will always have to authorize

GT.content: “freedom” in Kant’s speculative philosophy [?] can’t be demonstrated, it’s a “letter of credit for the moral law,” an assumption; also that (diabolical) evil can never be a motive
GT.linkedContent: “freedom” in Kant’s speculative philosophy [?] can’t be demonstrated, it’s a “letter of credit for the moral law,” an assumption; also that (diabolical) evil can never be a motive

GT.content: faith/belief (act of faith/credit) given w/ monetary language, practical reason cannot be separated from chremastics as we interpreted it above
GT.linkedContent: faith/belief (act of faith/credit) given w/ monetary language, practical reason cannot be separated from chremastics as we interpreted it above

AF.content: no archive of the secret, by definition, it is the very ash of the archive (speculation begins there, belief too)
AF.linkedContent: no archive of the secret, by definition, it is the very ash of the archive (speculation begins there, belief too)

MPM.content: narcissism (as speculation) too paradoxical, too cunning, to provide final word > instead, speculation whose ruses, mimes, strategies relinquish autonomy
MPM.linkedContent: narcissism (as speculation) too paradoxical, too cunning, to provide final word > instead, speculation whose ruses, mimes, strategies relinquish autonomy

ROP.content: death drive (repetition compulsion, fort/da), Evil Genius of Freud, the devil’s advocate, limping devil: by way of which psychoanalysis finds its speculative power & its greatest resistance
ROP.linkedContent: death drive (repetition compulsion, fort/da), Evil Genius of Freud, the devil’s advocate, limping devil: by way of which psychoanalysis finds its speculative power & its greatest resistance

SPEC.content: [re: Freud’s speculation, a logic beyond that of position] the “position’s” fall (chute) would cause bankruptcy, ruin, discredit: today I’ll speak of speculation, I’m betting I will
SPEC.linkedContent: [re: Freud’s speculation, a logic beyond that of position] the “position’s” fall (chute) would cause bankruptcy, ruin, discredit: today I’ll speak of speculation, I’m betting I will

SPEC.content: to account/read the athetic, Derrida unsatisfied w/ dérive (drifting), too continuous/homogenous movement, travels away w/out saccade > prefers double bind, des effondrements de bord, la rive se partage en son trait même
SPEC.linkedContent: to account/read the athetic, Derrida unsatisfied w/ dérive (drifting), too continuous/homogenous movement, travels away w/out saccade > prefers double bind, des effondrements de bord, la rive se partage en son trait même

SPEC.content: what is the child’s debt in a play w/out debt? on what w/out debt does play speculate in secret? what is the place of such a secret? [re: Freud’s debt to Nietzsche]
SPEC.linkedContent: what is the child’s debt in a play w/out debt? on what w/out debt does play speculate in secret? what is the place of such a secret? [re: Freud’s debt to Nietzsche]

SPEC.content: if one’s [intellectual] debt is always another’s, one is acquitted & guilty in advance? comment spéculer sur la dette d’un autre à soi revenant (amounting to, coming back to oneself)?
SPEC.linkedContent: if one’s [intellectual] debt is always another’s, one is acquitted & guilty in advance? comment spéculer sur la dette d’un autre à soi revenant (amounting to, coming back to oneself)?

SPEC.content: Freud’s speculation—philosophy?
SPEC.linkedContent: Freud’s speculation—philosophy?

SPEC.content: Freud’s speculation does not construct itself by itself like Hegel’s: however concerned w/ revenants, ne revient pas sur lui-même
SPEC.linkedContent: Freud’s speculation does not construct itself by itself like Hegel’s: however concerned w/ revenants, ne revient pas sur lui-même

SPEC.content: Freud’s speculation, interminable detour (Umweg): qu’il décrit “lui-même,” écrit et désécrit, pas d’écriture [like Rousseau, Freud describes but doesn’t declare]
SPEC.linkedContent: Freud’s speculation, interminable detour (Umweg): qu’il décrit “lui-même,” écrit et désécrit, pas d’écriture [like Rousseau, Freud describes but doesn’t declare]

SPEC.content: Freud’s empirical, biographical excuse for speculation [in Beyond…, recurrence of malignant disease] doesn’t get us far > because of parergonal supplement: autobiography becomes heterothanatographical, bios—croiser l’autre, se croiser avec l’autre
SPEC.linkedContent: Freud’s empirical, biographical excuse for speculation [in Beyond…, recurrence of malignant disease] doesn’t get us far > because of parergonal supplement: autobiography becomes heterothanatographical, bios—croiser l’autre, se croiser avec l’autre

SPEC.content: neither proof nor disproof of PP, belief in PP suspends belief in PP > the theory is mute about pleasure, only quantitative analysis > unpleasure as translation of pleasure
SPEC.linkedContent: neither proof nor disproof of PP, belief in PP suspends belief in PP > the theory is mute about pleasure, only quantitative analysis > unpleasure as translation of pleasure

SPEC.content: Freud’s speculation aims neither for originality nor priority, the other’s other (philosophy) > aporia of translation imposed in question life death, pleasure–unpleasure, repetition
SPEC.linkedContent: Freud’s speculation aims neither for originality nor priority, the other’s other (philosophy) > aporia of translation imposed in question life death, pleasure–unpleasure, repetition

SPEC.content: strategy whose finality’s not clear, no known genre, it overflows, thus the hypothesis, the athesis of athesis > asking questions in the dark: Freud’s phosphorescent antennae
SPEC.linkedContent: strategy whose finality’s not clear, no known genre, it overflows, thus the hypothesis, the athesis of athesis > asking questions in the dark: Freud’s phosphorescent antennae

SPEC.content: [vis-à-vis Freud] must try most open, loosest (lockerste, plus lâche) hypothesis to describe pleasure–unpleasure, an inevitable sensation/question which nobody has said anything about: a quantitative economics [energetics] w/out knowledge of essence
SPEC.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Freud] must try most open, loosest (lockerste, plus lâche) hypothesis to describe pleasure–unpleasure, an inevitable sensation/question which nobody has said anything about: a quantitative economics [energetics] w/out knowledge of essence

SPEC.content: non-simplicity, indirectness > relation btwn pleasure/unpleasure not simple correlation of decrease/increase of (free) energy: inexhaustible reserve for speculation: not substantial riches, but supplementary angles
SPEC.linkedContent: non-simplicity, indirectness > relation btwn pleasure/unpleasure not simple correlation of decrease/increase of (free) energy: inexhaustible reserve for speculation: not substantial riches, but supplementary angles

SPEC.content: Fechner’s “aesthetic indifference” btwn pleasure/unpleasure dropped by Freud > is this not like a free zone, agency of the “duty free” [in English], free exchange for speculation, a means to pass, as authorized contraband, an always ideal border (in both directions)?
SPEC.linkedContent: Fechner’s “aesthetic indifference” btwn pleasure/unpleasure dropped by Freud > is this not like a free zone, agency of the “duty free” [in English], free exchange for speculation, a means to pass, as authorized contraband, an always ideal border (in both directions)?

SPEC.content: Freud repeats his arrest, pas de marche: speculative possibility of tout autre (than PP), inscribed in advance w/in it, “l’ouvre d’une scription de l’autre à meme (overlaps) le principe”
SPEC.linkedContent: Freud repeats his arrest, pas de marche: speculative possibility of tout autre (than PP), inscribed in advance w/in it, “l’ouvre d’une scription de l’autre à meme (overlaps) le principe”

SPEC.content: la surface même du “à même (overlap)” does not belong to itself—writing affects the very surface of its support > non-belonging unleashes speculation
SPEC.linkedContent: la surface même du “à même (overlap)” does not belong to itself—writing affects the very surface of its support > non-belonging unleashes speculation

SPEC.content: Derrida corrupts (détourne) “properly Freudian” usage of speculation [i.e. a mode proper mode of research]: as production of surplus value, overflows, the given of the gift, oblique object of Freud’s discourse > Freud’s bias of procedure interests Derrida, the scene of what makes Freud write: faire faire, laisser faire, faire écrire, laisser écrire: the syntax of these operations not given [in Freud]
SPEC.linkedContent: Derrida corrupts (détourne) “properly Freudian” usage of speculation [i.e. a mode proper mode of research]: as production of surplus value, overflows, the given of the gift, oblique object of Freud’s discourse > Freud’s bias of procedure interests Derrida, the scene of what makes Freud write: faire faire, laisser faire, faire écrire, laisser écrire: the syntax of these operations not given [in Freud]

SPEC.content: detour, Umweg, breaks open the path (frayage) > Freud does not interrogate the graphics of the différant detour for itself (can it ever be for itself?)
SPEC.linkedContent: detour, Umweg, breaks open the path (frayage) > Freud does not interrogate the graphics of the différant detour for itself (can it ever be for itself?)

SPEC.content: death drive: être à l’oeuvre déjà (in PP), ça se sera écrit en silence—in speculative overflow
SPEC.linkedContent: death drive: être à l’oeuvre déjà (in PP), ça se sera écrit en silence—in speculative overflow

SPEC.content: Derrida examining what is irreducible to “speculation” in an economy of a scene of writing: scene of inheritance implicating the Freuds and psychoanalytic “movement”
SPEC.linkedContent: Derrida examining what is irreducible to “speculation” in an economy of a scene of writing: scene of inheritance implicating the Freuds and psychoanalytic “movement”

SPEC.content: PP always revient to itself, haunted by tout autre, retour never “acquits” speculation of PP
SPEC.linkedContent: PP always revient to itself, haunted by tout autre, retour never “acquits” speculation of PP

SPEC.content: PP cannot be contradicted (contredit); Freud confirms PP in its absolute sovereignty
SPEC.linkedContent: PP cannot be contradicted (contredit); Freud confirms PP in its absolute sovereignty

SPEC.content: [re: Freud’s “speculative” writing] démarche of this writing, advancing w/out advancing, time of a detour, pas de thèse repeats itself: PP will not let anything be done w/out it, except repetition itself
SPEC.linkedContent: [re: Freud’s “speculative” writing] démarche of this writing, advancing w/out advancing, time of a detour, pas de thèse repeats itself: PP will not let anything be done w/out it, except repetition itself

SPEC.content: Wiederholungszwang (repetition compulsion) put in communication w/ death drive
SPEC.linkedContent: Wiederholungszwang (repetition compulsion) put in communication w/ death drive

SPEC.content: “[PP, the spool, ça, SA, Ernst, Freud] fait semblant d’eloigner le PP pour le ramener sans cesse, pour constater qu’il se ramène lui-même” [hetero-tautology? bringing it all back home]
SPEC.linkedContent: “[PP, the spool, ça, SA, Ernst, Freud] fait semblant d’eloigner le PP pour le ramener sans cesse, pour constater qu’il se ramène lui-même” [hetero-tautology? bringing it all back home]

SPEC.content: fort/da and Freud’s speculative game: same application
SPEC.linkedContent: fort/da and Freud’s speculative game: same application

SPEC.content: how can [Freud’s] autobiography give a worldwide (mondiale) institution its birth? what is autobiography if everything that follows from it is possible?
SPEC.linkedContent: how can [Freud’s] autobiography give a worldwide (mondiale) institution its birth? what is autobiography if everything that follows from it is possible?

SPEC.content: speculator can survive legatee of an autobiographical speculation, institution of movement w/out limit: mutism/death of legatee, one of the possibilities that dictates/causes legatee to write
SPEC.linkedContent: speculator can survive legatee of an autobiographical speculation, institution of movement w/out limit: mutism/death of legatee, one of the possibilities that dictates/causes legatee to write

SPEC.content: one gives oneself one’s own movement, one inherits from oneself all the time
SPEC.linkedContent: one gives oneself one’s own movement, one inherits from oneself all the time

SPEC.content: sufficient provisions so ghost can always step up to the cashier (passer à la caisse); all that’s necessary is to pronounce a name guaranteeing a signature, one thinks
SPEC.linkedContent: sufficient provisions so ghost can always step up to the cashier (passer à la caisse); all that’s necessary is to pronounce a name guaranteeing a signature, one thinks

SPEC.content: because speculator is a motivated observer, completion could never be declared by him > also, there’s a structure of incompletion in scene of writing: unconscious binds (lie) one to other [scene described & description], telecommunicated acc. same teleology
SPEC.linkedContent: because speculator is a motivated observer, completion could never be declared by him > also, there’s a structure of incompletion in scene of writing: unconscious binds (lie) one to other [scene described & description], telecommunicated acc. same teleology

SPEC.content: for Freud, in game of fort/da, the greatest pleasure is the re-turn (re-venir), Wiederkommen: yet, again becoming revenant, [spool] must be thrown away again > [Freud, the game] speculates on the return (retour): au départ de ce qui se doit de revenir
SPEC.linkedContent: for Freud, in game of fort/da, the greatest pleasure is the re-turn (re-venir), Wiederkommen: yet, again becoming revenant, [spool] must be thrown away again > [Freud, the game] speculates on the return (retour): au départ de ce qui se doit de revenir

SPEC.content: analysand-locomotive (speculator/analyst the 1st analysand): for whom law of listening substituted for law of looking
SPEC.linkedContent: analysand-locomotive (speculator/analyst the 1st analysand): for whom law of listening substituted for law of looking

SPEC.content: curtains, veils, “skirt” of bed, hymen of fort:da, edge of bed (lit) [of reading?], va-et-vient, there would’ve been a hymen even w/out curtains > veil of this “skirt” is interest of bed (lit) and fort:da of all these generations
SPEC.linkedContent: curtains, veils, “skirt” of bed, hymen of fort:da, edge of bed (lit) [of reading?], va-et-vient, there would’ve been a hymen even w/out curtains > veil of this “skirt” is interest of bed (lit) and fort:da of all these generations

SPEC.content: [Derrida clearly explains the difference btwn fort/da and fort:da] “skirt” of bed, which hides the bars, forms inner chamber of fort/da, double screen which divides w/in itself—but dividing only by reassembling it w/ itself, sticking (piquant) to itself doubly, fort:da
SPEC.linkedContent: [Derrida clearly explains the difference btwn fort/da and fort:da] “skirt” of bed, which hides the bars, forms inner chamber of fort/da, double screen which divides w/in itself—but dividing only by reassembling it w/ itself, sticking (piquant) to itself doubly, fort:da

SPEC.content: all the Orphism of a speculation [?]
SPEC.linkedContent: all the Orphism of a speculation [?]

SPEC.content: mastery of PP [grand (-père) spéculateur], mastery in general, Herrschaft distanced from PP only to reappropriate itself: tauto-teleology makes other return in domestic specter
SPEC.linkedContent: mastery of PP [grand (-père) spéculateur], mastery in general, Herrschaft distanced from PP only to reappropriate itself: tauto-teleology makes other return in domestic specter

SPEC.content: speculator describes what he’s doing w/out doing so explicitly [Rousseau from OG], does w/out auto-analytic calculation, w/out calculation itself analyzing itself > thus the interest and necessity of the thing [for Freud? for Derrida?]
SPEC.linkedContent: speculator describes what he’s doing w/out doing so explicitly [Rousseau from OG], does w/out auto-analytic calculation, w/out calculation itself analyzing itself > thus the interest and necessity of the thing [for Freud? for Derrida?]

SPEC.content: classically [?]: art preserves proper name, science forgets proper name > what then is psychoanalysis?
SPEC.linkedContent: classically [?]: art preserves proper name, science forgets proper name > what then is psychoanalysis?

SPEC.content: payer la science de son proper nom, science of his [Freud’s] proper name (propre nom) inseparable from nom propre: speculation, pay in advance the charges for a return to sender: reste à s’avoir (it remains to be had/seen/known)
SPEC.linkedContent: payer la science de son proper nom, science of his [Freud’s] proper name (propre nom) inseparable from nom propre: speculation, pay in advance the charges for a return to sender: reste à s’avoir (it remains to be had/seen/known)

SPEC.content: that which entraps speculation: murderous, mournful, jealous, guilty identifications [re: Freud’s relation to death of his & Ernst’s younger brother] > rigorous stricture, legacy & jealousy of a repetition (already jealous of itself) pull its [fort:da’s] strings (tirent les fils) more or less strictly > scene of writing becomes auto-bio-thanato-hetero-graphic
SPEC.linkedContent: that which entraps speculation: murderous, mournful, jealous, guilty identifications [re: Freud’s relation to death of his & Ernst’s younger brother] > rigorous stricture, legacy & jealousy of a repetition (already jealous of itself) pull its [fort:da’s] strings (tirent les fils) more or less strictly > scene of writing becomes auto-bio-thanato-hetero-graphic

SPEC.content: je le suppose relu [re: Freud’s Beyond…]—gagner le temps (or essential form of that which interests the speculation)
SPEC.linkedContent: je le suppose relu [re: Freud’s Beyond…]—gagner le temps (or essential form of that which interests the speculation)

SPEC.content: [fort:da is a narrative] no thesis, only hypothesis, origin is speculative because the object cannot be the object of a thesis
SPEC.linkedContent: [fort:da is a narrative] no thesis, only hypothesis, origin is speculative because the object cannot be the object of a thesis

SPEC.content: to speculate: not only going beyond a given oppositional limit but the very notion of limit as front btwn two opposed terms—eg. the identifiable terms where every term terminates: life/death [Derrida’s eschatology?]
SPEC.linkedContent: to speculate: not only going beyond a given oppositional limit but the very notion of limit as front btwn two opposed terms—eg. the identifiable terms where every term terminates: life/death [Derrida’s eschatology?]

SPEC.content: is Freud’s discourse’s restance statutory?
SPEC.linkedContent: is Freud’s discourse’s restance statutory?

SPEC.content: Freud’s “to let develop” [re: Aristophanes’ speech] mortgages irresponsibility, no engagement, epokhē of judgment, speaks from no-place [Lacan takes Beyond… too seriously?]
SPEC.linkedContent: Freud’s “to let develop” [re: Aristophanes’ speech] mortgages irresponsibility, no engagement, epokhē of judgment, speaks from no-place [Lacan takes Beyond… too seriously?]

SPEC.content: speculation as advocatus diaboli, devil revient
SPEC.linkedContent: speculation as advocatus diaboli, devil revient

SPEC.content: no one demands to know what devil thinks dans son for intérieur, Freud can think the devil w/out putting himself on the devil’s side (no written promise/contract w/ devil)
SPEC.linkedContent: no one demands to know what devil thinks dans son for intérieur, Freud can think the devil w/out putting himself on the devil’s side (no written promise/contract w/ devil)

SPEC.content: speculation not intuitive (intellectual impartiality) but idiomatic, referential
SPEC.linkedContent: speculation not intuitive (intellectual impartiality) but idiomatic, referential

SPEC.content: scientific intuition requires minimum of speculation in language’s irreducible metaphoricity
SPEC.linkedContent: scientific intuition requires minimum of speculation in language’s irreducible metaphoricity

SPEC.content: speculation as provisional floating, distances from intuition, impartiality, science, psychology of depths
SPEC.linkedContent: speculation as provisional floating, distances from intuition, impartiality, science, psychology of depths

SPEC.content: [Freud divided] Freud translating translation into scientific theory: 1) “trans-” inhabit origin on (dès) its very threshold 2) perception as prior to its translation
SPEC.linkedContent: [Freud divided] Freud translating translation into scientific theory: 1) “trans-” inhabit origin on (dès) its very threshold 2) perception as prior to its translation

SPEC.content: garde-fou has disappeared en chemin, all speculative transferences are of the party (partie); transference: as transpose, translate, network of correspondences, traffic, postal, railway, sorting
SPEC.linkedContent: garde-fou has disappeared en chemin, all speculative transferences are of the party (partie); transference: as transpose, translate, network of correspondences, traffic, postal, railway, sorting

SPEC.content: [re: Freud’s Beyond…] passage btwn transference & speculation > speculative transference orients, destines, calculates most original & most passive “first step” on very threshold of perception: desire for concept of perception belongs to destiny of this calculation
SPEC.linkedContent: [re: Freud’s Beyond…] passage btwn transference & speculation > speculative transference orients, destines, calculates most original & most passive “first step” on very threshold of perception: desire for concept of perception belongs to destiny of this calculation

SPEC.content: w/out borrowing, nothing begins, il n’y a pas de fonds propre, there’s no transference of fund, l’emprunt rapporte, produces surplus value, is the prime mover of every investment > on commence ainsi par spéculer, en pariant sur une valeur à produire comme à partir de rien: all these “metaphors” confirm, as metaphors, the necessity of what they state
SPEC.linkedContent: w/out borrowing, nothing begins, il n’y a pas de fonds propre, there’s no transference of fund, l’emprunt rapporte, produces surplus value, is the prime mover of every investment > on commence ainsi par spéculer, en pariant sur une valeur à produire comme à partir de rien: all these “metaphors” confirm, as metaphors, the necessity of what they state

SPEC.content: desire & throw of the dice beyond PP is Freud’s pleasure
SPEC.linkedContent: desire & throw of the dice beyond PP is Freud’s pleasure

SPEC.content: speculation [beyond PP], investment made by borrowing, no possibility of amortization, no reconciliation by coins, signs, and their telos—promise more than can provide [formula of love?], insolvent—infinite debt, unpayable, thus beyond debt, violates economy of equivalence (not economy in general)
SPEC.linkedContent: speculation [beyond PP], investment made by borrowing, no possibility of amortization, no reconciliation by coins, signs, and their telos—promise more than can provide [formula of love?], insolvent—infinite debt, unpayable, thus beyond debt, violates economy of equivalence (not economy in general)

SPEC.content: death drive & repetition compulsion suck Freud into abyss of PP, always adding a supplement of abyss beneath his steps (movement of trans-)
SPEC.linkedContent: death drive & repetition compulsion suck Freud into abyss of PP, always adding a supplement of abyss beneath his steps (movement of trans-)

SPEC.content: the démarche (procedure) of Beyond… is one of its objects, effects trans- and speculation
SPEC.linkedContent: the démarche (procedure) of Beyond… is one of its objects, effects trans- and speculation

SPEC.content: PP (the master) is not master > pleasure, the great speculator, calculates w/ effects of aphrodisiac stricture (Socrates wanted nothing to do with proper name of Aphrodite)
SPEC.linkedContent: PP (the master) is not master > pleasure, the great speculator, calculates w/ effects of aphrodisiac stricture (Socrates wanted nothing to do with proper name of Aphrodite)

SPEC.content: quasi-proper name is the X that speculates [re: Freud’s Beyond…] w/out identity: sets in place proper trap of its suspension, limits itself in order to increase itself—if it did not limit itself: absolute discharge, disbanding, nothingness of death
SPEC.linkedContent: quasi-proper name is the X that speculates [re: Freud’s Beyond…] w/out identity: sets in place proper trap of its suspension, limits itself in order to increase itself—if it did not limit itself: absolute discharge, disbanding, nothingness of death
